text: Malcolm Hebden (born 21 December 1939) is an English actor. He is known for portraying the role of Norris Cole in the long-running ITV soap opera, Coronation Street, a role which he played from 1994 to 1997, 1999 to 2017, and again from 2019 to 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Cheshire Category:People with dyslexia
title: Malcolm Hebden
